text:
Everyone!
Thank you for coming to our live today!

...U-Um...
there's something... I want to tell you all!

The theme we're putting into this stage... It is—
Our feelings.

Hehe,
I was thinking of saying the same thing.

Even Chiyuki-san...!
But if we do that—

If it's about that, I'll talk to the staff,
so let's try doing what everyone thinks is best.

You know, ...how about we go around
and each list something we love?

...Yeah!
Amana wants to hear everyone's favorites!

Hehe, then I'll start...
First, "Seeing lots of people smiling".

Hehe... Very Chiyuki-san-like... Tenka says,
"Getting the highest score in a game"... Makes me happy...

Okay, next is Amana, right? "Flipping through photo albums"
... I think... What about you, Producer?

Am I joining too...!?
Then, "Watching the stage from backstage".

"The moment heading to the stage" "The scent of flowers"
"New dreams"

"The snack corner" "Holding hands"
"The audience bathed in pink light"

"Chatty conversations that make you forget time" 
"Friendly rivals" "Overlapping singing voices"
